title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: When updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be displayed during the update process.
OB: The checked state of the table checkboxes is taking a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to update.
EB: The checked state of the table checkboxes should update quickly, ideally within a few seconds. Additionally, a busy cursor should be displayed during the update process.
SR: 1. Open the Export Zip feature.2. Observe the time it takes for the checked state of the table checkboxes to update.3. Confirm that no busy cursor is displayed during the update process.
